div.class: flex flex-col h-full overflow-y-auto overflow-x-hidden smooth-scroll transition-all
relative z-10 grid items-center lg:gap-6 xl:gap-10 mx-auto pt-4 pb-6 px-6 lg:px-12
hidden lg:flex item-center justify-end gap-10 lg:col-span-2

ul.class: lg:flex items-center gap-x-4 gap-y-2 flex-wrap justify-end hidden

button.class: inline-flex items-center justify-center p-2 rounded-md focus:outline-none transition-colors duration-300
